name: White Pasta
des: Home made Pasta with cheese. It has chicken, capcicum and many other vegetable. You can order any quantity of it.

name: Hydrabadi Biriany
des: Most delicious Home Made Hydrabadi biriyany in town. You will get mouth watery when u smell this food. Per biriyani pot contains 1kg of biriyany

name: Duck's Vuna khichuri
des: Duck's Vuna khichuri or has er vuna khichuri. Per packet contains 250gm of khichuri. You will get 2pcs of ducks meat.

name: Blust cheesy Pizza
des: 12 inch Home made cheesy pizza contains cheese, mashroom, peporoni, black olive, chicken, sausage. Cauze of those item this is blast pizza.

name: Tandoori chicken
des: Home made tandoori chicken is now available in town. It has no artificial color on it. We use fresh chicken and spice to make this more delicious and healthy

name: Chicken Pasta
des: No cheese no white sauce. This pasta is made with chicken and other vegetable. This is for those who want to diet but can not avoid Pasta.
